title: Thai Green Curry
description: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the cooked greens and cook until heated through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
procedures: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat.
Add the curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the cooked greens and cook until heated through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Thai Red Curry
description: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the cooked prawns and cook until heated through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
procedures: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat.
Add the curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add the cooked prawns and cook until heated through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Thai Yellow Curry
description: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. Add the cooked chicken and cook until heated through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Thai Green Papaya Salad
description: Peel and chop the papaya into small pieces. Remove the seeds and any white pith. Grate the carrots and chop the peanuts. Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
procedures: Peel and chop the papaya into small pieces.
Remove the seeds and any white pith.
Grate the carrots and chop the peanuts.
Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Thai Basil Chicken
description: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides and cooked through. Add the basil and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
procedures: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat.
Add the chicken and cook until browned on all sides and cooked through.
Add the basil and cook until wilted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Thai Prawn Soup
description: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the prawns and cook until pink and cooked through. Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
procedures: Heat the oil in a large pan over a medium heat.
Add the prawns and cook until pink and cooked through.
Add the coconut milk and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
